attributes.action: support British business by suspending stamp duty on the renewal of business leases for the duration of the recession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Businesses are currently charged stamp duty when renewing the leases on their existing premises.

During a recession, stamp duty is a burden that can lead to additional financial pressures, potentially resulting in redundancies or even forcing businesses to close.

Suspending stamp duty on business leases would help protect companies from the effects of the recession.
